page.title: 06LIFE STYLES
page.content: HELPING MY DAD ON THE FRUIT ROUND by JIMMY McLENNAN. ON SATURDAYS I HELP MY DAD.HE WORKS ON A FRUIT AND POTATO ROUND.FIRST I GET UP,GET DRESSED AND HAVE MY BREAKFAST. THEN I WAIT FOR MY DAD.HE COMES AT 5.30 IN HIS LORRY.THEN WE SET OFF TO THE WAREHOUSE.THEN WE LOAD UP THE LORRY WITH BANNANAS,APPLES,ORANGES, KIWI FRUITS,MELONS,PINEAPPLES AND POTATOS.THEN WE SET OFF TO GRIMSBY. WHEN WE GET THERE OUR FIRST STOP IS JACK NEWMANS.WE GIVE HIM HIS ORDER. THEN HE PAYS US. WE LEAVE FOR OUR NEXT STOP.THIS IS A SPAR SHOP.BUT I DON'T KNOW WHO OWNS IT.WE GIVE HIM HIS ORDER THEN HE PAYS US.THIS TAKES ABOUT 1 AND A HALF HOURS.SOON WE COME TO OUR LAST STOP.THIS IS A CHINESE TAKEAWAY.ALL HE HAS IS A BAG OF ONIONS AND SOME MUSHROOMS.THEN WE GO HOME AND HAVE OUR DINNER.
